group.description: Entity group required for the entity to pass the check. One of `default`, `undead`, `arthropod`, `illager` and `aquatic`.
group.markdownDescription: Entity group required for the entity to pass the check. One of `default`, `undead`, `arthropod`, `illager` and `aquatic`.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/entity_group)

Checks whether the entity is of a specific entity group.

Type ID: `origins:entity_group`

!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Mob (Classification)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Mob#Classification) for more information about entity groups.
